headline: Diana Shipping Inc. Announces Time Charter Contract for m/v DSI Altair With Bunge
summary: ATHENS, Greece, Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diana Shipping Inc. (NYSE: DSX), (the “Company”), a global shipping company specializing in the ownership and bareboat charter-in of dry bulk vessels, today announced that, through a separate wholly-owned subsidiary, it has entered into a time charter contract with Bunge SA, Geneva, for one of its Ultramax dry bulk vessels, the m/v DSI Altair. The gross charter rate is US$14,750 per day, minus a 5.00% commission paid to third parties, for a perio
